name: Shu's Misfortune
storyline: Shu wants to end her father's haute couture legacy by unraveling his empire of fashion. Shu is determined to embroider a most treacherous scheme that will put an end to this empire of threads and drought.
summary: Shu's Misfortune is a sample RPG made in RPG Maker MZ. As Shu, end your father's haute couture legacy by unraveling his empire of fashion.
